title: Can't open league
body: I switched out my graphics card from a 780 ti that bricked to a 670 have already ordered a new one anyway whenever I click on the league icon it opens for a split second and disappears.  I already tried the delete folder in RADs and tried using the hextech repair tool.  Neither has worked so idk what to do at this point.  Help please

replies.body: I don't recommend ever deleting files to resolve an issue unless specified, as that usually ends up causing more problems in the long run.  Your issue sounds to be a security setting problem with your OS that's preventing the patcher from loading.  Use our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up and restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
When I use hextech and hit force repatch it closes right as it gets to that point as well so idk what to do.
